headline: No upgrade needed: CloudFlare sites already protected from FREAK
keywords: Vulnerabilities, OpenSSL, SSL, Attacks, RC4, Elliptic Curves
description: The newly announced FREAK vulnerability is not a concern for CloudFlare's SSL customers. We do not support 'export grade' cryptography (which, by its nature, is weak) and we upgraded to the non-vulnerable version of OpenSSL the day it was released in early January.
